评论概述: PAY ATTENTION TO THE NAMES OF THE COLORS!!
评论详情: I ordered “Grey-Warm.” There were lots of colors offered including several greys. I thought “warm” had something to do with the shade of grey. Nope! The “warm” refers to THE FLEECED LINING INSIDE THESE PANTS. These would be good for hiking in January/February in a cold climate. The fleece is VERY WARM. Since it’s not what I was originally looking for, I returned them and ordered the “grey.”

评论概述: Ladies, THEY'RE INSULATED, and REAL POCKETS
评论详情: They felt heavy at first, until I tried them on. They fit just right, room to grow or shrink (me, not the pants). It wasn't until later I even realized they are insulated, with a soft felt on the inside. They are super comfy, With or without a belt. Stretchy waist sides are nice too. There's double belt loops in the back, so my belt doesn't tug as much. That's nice. The leg pockets are a great add, but the bonus is the front pockets are actually deep. Not fake girl pants pockets. I'll be wearing these for many outdoor adventures, and probably ordering another pair or 2. For reference, I'm 5'3, ordered a 14, they're kinda loose, in all the right ways.

Well I wear a 14\16 in AE jeans. After reading reviews I ordered a size up. They were way too lil. I could button them but I couldn’t breathe. I can say the pants I received were very thick which is perfect for me because I walk to work downtown in a city & it’s a wind tunnel between all those big tall buildings.  Not to mention we are right next to the Ohio River. I’m just hoping these aren’t entirely too long but I’ll update after I get the next size & can actually wear them. UPDATE-I wanted to get all the colors but I’m so upset that at 5’2 these are way too long. Returning  again :

They were comfortable, fit well(I just wish they were a tad longer),a heavier material not thin, tons of pockets and they moved with me. We climbed over some pretty huge rocks/boulders. I normally wear a size 6 but a 4 was recommended. Perfect fit! I would definitely recommend these!

评论概述: GREAT for thick thigh girls - I love them!!
评论详情: I have these pants in Camo Pink, Camo Purple, Camo Wine, Purple, Grass Green, Kakie, Camo Green, Camo Blue, Black/White Camo and now these absolutely fabulous Camo Orange (My favorite!!). This color is by far my favorite!! I LOVE them all. (I would LOVE it if they would make more BOLD colors) I get compliments almost every day. I am a nurse and have to wear the company provided "uniform" top. (I can wear the pants of my choice) I find these pants to be very comfortable and roomy enough for my thick thighs. (Most pants I find that will accommodate my thighs are way too big in the waist area. I love that I can wear a real belt with these and the belt loop placement in the back are spread out making the "pull" on the belt even on both sides - This helps my belt last longer (not just pulling in the center back). Where I work, we have to be keenly aware of Opiate use and overdoses. The cargo pockets are great for carrying 2 doses of Narcan, so I am ready for Opiate overdose emergencies. (unfortunately, they get used often) The small zipper pocket on the left front keeps my car keys safe (won't come out if I reach for something in my pocket. I pull the ties out of the ankle areas and the pants hang very well for my 32" inseam. I wear the size 14 - I am 5"3" - my waist is 37" and my hips are 47" I hope this helps. The Compliments I get are wonderful.
Sizing is perfect, so get what you wear! The quality is excellent! I thought they were a little expensive, but they're worth it! G Great fit, heavy good quality material and they look darn good on!!!
The pants are nice and the color is nice. I had to return do to sizing.

The pants are comfortable with lots of pockets. They can look good with tennis shoes or boots for the fall. I plan on purchasing more colors.
I love the pockets and the fabric
